name: TIOCONAZOLE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From 13.10.2 Antifungal preparations: British National Formulary)
Cautions Contact with eyes and mucous membranes should be avoided.
side-effects:
Side-effects see notes above; also local oedema, dry skin,
nail discoloration, periungual inflammation, nail pain, rash, exfoliation
doses:
Apply to nails and surrounding skin twice daily usually
for up to 6 months (may be extended to 12 months)
